originalText.text: Outstanding care overall.  The Carnegie Endoscopy Center works like a well oiled machine where everybody, from the front desk to the nurses and doctors ,  is very professional as well as attentive and nice to patients.  One of the best experiences I have had as a patient in a medical setting. Highly recommend Dr George and this facility for any Endoscopic procedures.

originalText.text: Dr George is very professional.  very caring  helped me out. very knowledgeable.  plus always on time . have been using him for many years . I highly recommend Dr George to other people and my family members.

text.text: Dr George is very professional.  very caring  helped me out. very knowledgeable.  plus always on time . have been using him for many years . I highly recommend Dr George to other people and my family members.

originalText.text: The doctor came highly recommended to me and I have to agree:.He is held in high regard by many and now by myself as well. I traveled from Bergen County, It was worth the trip. I was seen promptly. The staff is  courteous and the doctor is quite thorough. I will be returning,!

text.text: The doctor came highly recommended to me and I have to agree:.He is held in high regard by many and now by myself as well. I traveled from Bergen County, It was worth the trip. I was seen promptly. The staff is  courteous and the doctor is quite thorough. I will be returning,!

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. George for over 25 years.  He is the best GI doctor I’ve ever met!  I have Crohn’s disease over 45 years and he is always striving to get me into a remission.  He knows all the cutting edge treatment for Crohn’s and colitis.  He always is available for a question, and has the best bedside manner.  I only hope he never retires!!!  I wouldn’t  trust my treatment with any other doctor.

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr. George for over 25 years.  He is the best GI doctor I’ve ever met!  I have Crohn’s disease over 45 years and he is always striving to get me into a remission.  He knows all the cutting edge treatment for Crohn’s and colitis.  He always is available for a question, and has the best bedside manner.  I only hope he never retires!!!  I wouldn’t  trust my treatment with any other doctor.

originalText.text:
Dr. George is truly an exceptional doctor, renowned for his expertise and remarkable reputation. His unparalleled bedside manners set him apart, creating a comforting and supportive environment for patients.

I also want to commend the excellent office staff who consistently go the extra mile to ensure patient satisfaction. Their willingness to provide outstanding service contributes significantly to the overall positive experience at your practice.

Thank you for maintaining such high standards of healthcare, and please extend my appreciation to Dr. George and the entire office team.

Best regards,
